sect2.title: Installation of bc
sect2.para: Download the patches for bc from .
Install bc by running the following commands:

userinput.command: patch -Np1 -i ../bc-1.06-flex-invocation.patch && patch -Np1 -i ../bc-1.06-info.patch && patch -Np1 -i ../bc-1.06-readline.patch && ./configure --prefix=/usr --with-readline && make && make install
